analyzed: ▁sa nidassan attika ▁citta saha bhū du ka

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ▁an idassanaappaṭigh aṃ ▁citta saha bhu ṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na an idassanaappaṭigh o ▁no citt a saha bhū ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁saṃkhittaṃ

original: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
